title: Prosecutor praises Cosby accuser's courage to stand up
text:
Prosecutor praises Cosby accuser's courage to stand up Thursday, April 26, 2018 - 01:28
Montgomery County District Attorney Kevin Steele praised the courage of Andrea Constand, who accused comedian Bill Cosby of drugging and sexually assaulting, for standing up against one of the most famous celebrities. Cosby faces faces up to 10 years in prison for each of three counts of aggravated indecent assault. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
